main event: A civilian reported seeing a brilliantly illuminated object in the eastern sky on 28 Oct 1959.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The object was described as a round, bright white light with a 30-mile long exhaust trail,The object was confirmed to be a NASA balloon rocket launched from Wallops Island,The sighting was reported by multiple civilians in the area, and military personnel were involved in the follow-up investigation.
witness description: a man and his wife returning home from Vermont
